comment._content: what's inside a world of mirth? let's just all agree the loc has done us all very proud. well done loc. the photographs are great. does vermont still hold these shows?

comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Land of Worlds - Signs, and we'd love to have your photo added to the group.

comment._content: I only like mirth if it's mixed with merriment.  :p

comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: The World of Mirth was a 50-car railroad carnival that traveled the Eastern Seaboard from 1933 to 1963. It employed 470 people.

comment.author: 27991056@N07
comment._content: Pardon me, but is this where one could possibly attain glee as well?

comment.author: 91320766@N03
comment._content: Hi it was nice to see the picture of the World of Mirth ..My mom  worked for the World of Mirth and I can remember going into the elephant tents and all they had were chains around their ankles and I can remember how hughe they were and that we were able to feed them hay,,They were like big dogs to us..harmless.Till this day I want an elephant ha ha.Thanks
